page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO BROMYARD
page.content: {Bromyard}is a small town in the county of{Herefordshire.}It has a population of approximately{3000. The countryside around is very beautiful. It is situated in a sheltered position so it has mild winds and weather. The town has its own industrial estate and several housing estates, accomodating both council and private houses. There are many shops in the town centre serving the local area. Many tourists come in Summer from {Birmingham.}Most are attracted by local events such as the{Gala. Although the town has lost its market, it still retains strong links with the farming community.
